fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.heater

Interface HeaterTemperatureI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HeaterExternalControlCI, HeaterExternalControlI, HeaterExternalControlJava4CI, HeaterInternalControlCI, HeaterInternalControlI, HeaterUserCI, HeaterUserI, HeaterUserJava4CI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Heater, HeaterExternalControlConnector, HeaterExternalControlInboundPort, HeaterExternalControlJava4InboundPort, HeaterExternalControlOutboundPort, HeaterInternalControlConnector, HeaterInternalControlInboundPort, HeaterInternalControlOutboundPort, HeaterUserConnector, HeaterUserInboundPort, HeaterUserJava4InboundPort, HeaterUserOutboundPort

    public interface HeaterTemperatureI
    The interface HeaterTemperatureI declares the signatures of the services accessing the current and target temperatures on the heater.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       MIN_TARGET_TEMPERATURE != null && MIN_TARGET_TEMPERATURE.getMeasurementUnit().equals(TEMPERATURE_UNIT)
 invariant       MAX_TARGET_TEMPERATURE != null && MAX_TARGET_TEMPERATURE.getMeasurementUnit().equals(TEMPERATURE_UNIT)

    Created on : 2023-09-18

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

        get the current target temperature.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    return != null && Heater.TEMPERATURE_UNIT.equals(return.getMeasurementUnit())
 post    return.getData() >= Heater.MIN_TARGET_TEMPERATURE.getData() && return.getData() <= Heater.MAX_TARGET_TEMPERATURE.getData()
        Returns:
